text: Mu 6.1 Lo 23.25 tɨbɨ Isɨlaelɨ hɨdɨlɨ agɨladɨ alusɨsɨ mɨhiŋ hɨvɨ Jisasɨ nudɨ hulemɨlɨ agɨlaŋ hula uavɨmi. Hɨbɨ pɨlɨ mu halɨha cahu uitɨ hualabɨla alɨhaŋ hɨniadami heŋ uavɨmi. Uu nudɨ hulemɨlɨ agɨlaŋ halɨha cahu uitɨ hɨlɨcɨ agɨladɨ likɨlavɨmi. Likɨla likɨla human hɨvɨ mɨŋahɨtɨhalavɨdaci sɨgɨtɨ agɨlaŋ mɨgalahɨlavɨdaci amɨŋ agɨladɨ nana uavɨmi.
